posts.title: Tsubasa: Soccer Launches March 7 on Roblox
posts.content:
We’re excited to announce the release of our first game, Tsubasa Soccer, launching on March 7 on Roblox.

Tsubasa Soccer brings fast-paced, skill-based soccer gameplay to Roblox. Players can pass, shoot, and compete in multiplayer matches with friends, all designed to feel smooth, responsive, and rewarding.


This is just the beginning — we’ll be updating the game with new features and improvements based on community feedback.

Mark your calendars and get ready to hit the field. Tsubasa Soccer is launching March 7, and we can’t wait to see you play.
